In England, in the seven days to 15 July, there were 150,591 new confirmed cases (266.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 08 July, there were 175,974 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 14% (25,383 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 20 July is 19,560,297 (34,589.3 cases per 100,000 population).
